trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a resource manager cannot communicate with the transaction manager.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionManagerCommunicationException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionManagerCommunicationException"></xref> class with the specified message.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionManagerCommunicationException"></xref> class with the specified serialization and streaming context information.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization context.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionManagerCommunicationException"></xref> class with the specified message and inner exception.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
Gets the exception instance that causes the current exception.
For more information, see the <xref href="System.Exception.InnerException"></xref> property.
